product_highlights: Sample and small batch sizes available
Suitable for DIY and professional formulators
notes: Formulator Sample Shop (FSS) offers FSS Saccharomyces Ferment, a potent anti-aging ingredient derived from yeast fermentation. The yeast fractions increase skin vitality and provide rejuvenating effects. FSS specializes in providing sample sizes and small batches for cosmetic formulators, making it ideal for product development, testing, and small-scale production. Popular among DIY formulators and indie brands for its quality and accessibility. The Saccharomyces ferment is recognized for its ability to support skin health through microbiome-friendly mechanisms.
